item.title: ChromaTracker alpha 0.0.1
item.description: I've published the first alpha build of a web app I'm working on called ChromaTracker. It's a MOD music tracker designed to be usable on a phone/tablet. The attached page has more info and a link to try it out.

item.title: N-Space version 1.4.1
item.description: I missed posting the last couple N-Space releases. Version 1.4.0 added "Prop" objects and some other improvements. Version 1.4.1 is a bug fix release, and is now available on Google Play. There is also now a Web Player for playing .nspace files in a desktop browser.

item.title: ChromaFiler version 0.7.1 released
item.description: This is a small bug fix release for ChromaFiler, including some bugs that were introduced by recent Windows 11 updates.

item.title: ChromaFiler version 0.7.0 released
item.description: Lots of changes to move ChromaFiler closer to being a proper "spatial" file manager.

item.title: Aodix Enhanced version 4.2.0.3 released
item.description: New version of my fork of Aodix, with more bug fixes and plugin compatibility improvements.

item.title: ChromaFiler version 0.6.1 released
item.description: Lots of bug fixes, some improvements to the text editor, and better shell integration when set as the default file browser.

item.title: N-Space version 1.3.5 released
item.description: (late post) I made an update to my level design app N-Space, with a few improvements and new features like a "Scale" behavior.

item.title: ChromaFiler version 0.6.0 released
item.description: This update includes many UI improvements, better Windows 7 compatibility, and some bug fixes.

item.title: Aodix Enhanced version 4.2.0.2 released
item.description: Aodix was recently made open source, and I've been working on my own fork to fix some bugs. I've released a new version which should fix a lot of plugin compatibility issues.

item.title: N-Space 2 Progress Update
item.description: I wrote an update on Reddit about my progress on a successor to N-Space.

item.title: ChromaFiler version 0.5.1 released
item.description: Small bug fix release for ChromaFiler.

item.title: New site design published
item.description: I'll use this page to post updates about anything I'm working on.
